title: I Am the Emperor of Europe - Novel Updates
tags: Adopted Protagonist   Age Progression   Aristocracy   Beautiful Female Lead   Cautious Protagonist   Charismatic Protagonist   Childhood Friends   Cunning Protagonist   Destiny   European Ambience   Handsome Male Lead   Kingdoms   Knights   Leadership   Lost Civilizations   Male Protagonist   Mysterious Family Background   Nationalism   Power Struggle   Religions   Rivalry   Romantic Subplot   Royalty   Wars
author: Tinplate   马口铁
description:
This is the mysterious juvenile destruction of the Ottoman Empire, the Austro-Hungarian Empire, the First French Empire, the Russian Empire, and the British Empire.

The protagonist’s rivals includes:

Napoleon, Nelson, Kutuzov, Archduke Charles and the Duke of Wellington.

The king of the kingdom of kings: the king of Egypt, the king of Jordan, the king of Syria, the king of Naples, the king of Armenia, the king of Serbia, the king of Morocco.

Grand Duke of Bulgaria, Grand Duke of Vallarta, Minister of Montenegro, Prince of Bosnia and Herzegovina, Prince of Cyprus, Duke of Corsica, Duke of Barrie, Albanian Duke, Libya, Tunisia, Algeria and Gibraltar Lords, and the Knights of the Templars.

This is the legend of a boy who became the emperor of Europe.>
